a9d5fc54-ce04-4836-ba41-0746c58b1b11.content: Consciousness tuning overlay now resolves runtime_overrides over tuned_overlay over base config.

5c084c80-f363-428a-84e7-10bc05ae4c2a.content: Autotune module executes propose-trial-commit/rollback loop with guardrail metrics.

e8c8f867-3cec-4085-bb16-567b864f173d.content: MCP stale-session compatibility now returns deterministic 400 responses when recovery is disabled.

34cd2c39-0300-4f31-b20e-24fcc74af243.content: Autotune now supports bayes_pareto acquisition with Pareto frontier tracking and objective history persistence.

b3fa722c-4274-4cb9-8dfa-df0388602254.content: Attention and workspace competition now adapt online from gw.reaction_trace reward signals.

dc41bde2-2666-4eee-92f8-a02833d0ce54.content: Operational rule: execute project python checks through eidosian_venv in Termux for deterministic dependency context.

e3859000-11f4-4c71-b86e-8ede0a5dbc23.content: Consciousness runtime now exposes adversarial red-team campaigns via eidctl and MCP, with persisted bench.red_team_result reports and latest-report resources.

c50325d0-db49-4112-8582-2b4318c49774.content: Bench task suite includes self_other_discrimination, continuity_distraction, and report_grounding_challenge for closed-loop behavioral probes.

e74103f7-9d97-4b79-adc0-277e3b64929d.content: Full benchmark interfaces now accept red-team controls: run_red_team, red_team_quick, red_team_max_scenarios, and red_team_seed across CLI and MCP.

82292ab8-0f74-4b88-ac59-4e949259a765.content: Integrated benchmark report schema includes red_team section, red_team_score, and red-team gate results for regression-safe runtime decisions.

7040c0c1-071c-45d8-9062-934add61992a.content: eidos_mcp full integration test harness restores kb/memory files after execution to keep repository state stable across reruns.

f0dcdfbf-9ba4-4b31-9580-20a0b954c152.content: Autotune commit-path now enforces quick red-team adversarial thresholds before overlay persistence, with explicit rollback reasons for unavailable campaigns and failed robustness gates.

ba793301-b7c2-4940-8614-c4deebb3c4d6.content: Consciousness bench trial snapshots and guardrail counters now derive from EventIndex buckets, including GW winner counts via broadcasts_by_kind and per-type counters via by_type.

59ede79a-5ee1-46a5-a0fa-6ac0060811e5.content: Workflow security-audit.yml now inventories Dependabot alerts and can enforce optional critical/high severity gates while always artifacting JSON/log outputs.

41815211-75ea-4242-9db3-cce8687ff33f.content: security-audit workflow now maintains a Security Dependency Delta Report issue using baseline markers and closes it automatically when high/critical risk clears.

792397c3-1ee8-4a99-bcd3-6375e20c109f.content: workflow-action-pin-audit.yml now enforces lock-based GitHub Action drift policy using audit_data/workflow_action_lock.json and rejects mutable refs.

96e3a8ed-7eab-4a59-8efe-6308699d4e60.content: security-audit workflow now builds remediation batches from Dependabot summaries and synchronizes keyed remediation issues automatically via scripts/dependabot_remediation_plan.py and scripts/sync_security_remediation_issues.py.

ab5f4066-da38-4201-ab85-b5df3f45209c.content: Security hardening capability: scripts/dependabot_autopatch_requirements.py builds deterministic pip pin updates from Dependabot raw alerts (first_patched_version), supports dry-run/write, and preserves rollback via timestamped backups plus structured JSON/Markdown reports.

3029ab9a-4a26-4596-bb1d-e62bc9398982.content: No-fix advisory mitigation playbook established: when Dependabot lacks first_patched_version, reduce direct dependency surface where imports are absent (ecdsa/keras) and apply explicit version escapes when vulnerable range bounds are known (orjson > 3.11.4).

a145bade-f093-46f6-9f75-aa2001d30b2e.content: Phase 17 closure fact: end-to-end automated remediation loop achieved zero open Dependabot alerts and closed outstanding remediation batch issues in Ace1928/eidosian_forge.

76077d8d-1e76-4170-857c-b5533c85d06e.content: Phase 18 capability: consciousness runtime now enforces module watchdog quarantine/recovery and payload truncation safety envelopes with explicit telemetry for observability-driven hardening.

b0e6c2a8-cc94-41d4-8ef2-df475a2166aa.content: Phase 18 completion capability: runtime health now surfaces watchdog and payload-safety state across `eidctl` and MCP (`consciousness_kernel_status`), and payload/event-pressure stress benchmarks are first-class with CI trend aggregation.

ee5520b6-b8d4-4f73-8a9a-6ec96be3292d.content: Consciousness runtime status path is now side-effect-free: `ConsciousnessTrialRunner.status()` reads watchdog/payload health via `ConsciousnessKernel.read_runtime_health(...)` from persisted state instead of constructing a live kernel instance.

40281b53-ab83-428b-a2f2-bb7cb52b114c.content: Phase 19 parity control added a deterministic Linux audit matrix runner that now drives both local parity smoke checks and CI artifact generation, reducing Termux/Linux drift risk.

207cd2e2-949a-47cd-8138-2079ab86cd7d.content: Phase 20 observability hardened Linux parity by integrating linux_audit reports into trend analytics and enforcing latest_fail_count == 0 as a CI gate in the consciousness parity workflow.

750ebc78-8e2e-4466-a8a6-2f000ea35dc6.content: Phase 21 event-fabric hardening introduced first-class event identity (`event_id`, `ts_ms`) and marker-bounded bench capture (`bench.trial_start` to `bench.trial_end`) to improve deterministic causal-window artifact extraction.

cb117831-7fb4-4322-bedb-98635ce8edb4.content: Phase 22 provenance hardening added replay-grade trial artifacts (`module_state_snapshot.json`, `replay_manifest.json`) and report-level capture digest/event-id coverage metadata, enabling deterministic post-run validation across environments.

0cea89d1-c1ea-4eec-870c-d15fa56c3945.content: Phase 23 documentation hardening introduced automated repository directory coverage via `scripts/generate_directory_atlas.py`, producing `docs/DIRECTORY_ATLAS.md` (linked depth-limited map) and `docs/DIRECTORY_INDEX_FULL.txt` (complete recursive index), validated with dedicated script tests and consciousness benchmark/stress runs.

90941e5b-422a-48dd-a948-86bec8955b6f.content: Directory atlas generation is now deterministic by default with scope-aware controls and CI drift enforcement workflow.

6fb13215-06d7-4399-9797-274ce01ac435.content: Refactor Forge provides AST-based code transformations including identifier renaming and docstring removal.

75bb5880-a002-4470-92fb-5f55d453316f.content: GraphRAG qualitative assessment contract v1 combines deterministic pipeline metrics with federated local-model judge consensus and guardrail capping when placeholder community reports are detected.

94f4fb6f-496f-4b81-8080-8b3c720b09b3.content: GraphRAG benchmark script now includes strict output-quality gates: placeholder detection, schema checks, relevance checks, and non-informative answer rejection.

fcccca30-873c-433a-b1e1-95ce0005d5e9.content: Defaulting EIDOS_MCP_STATELESS_HTTP=1 in eidos_mcp/run_server.sh resolved repeated stale-session MCP transport failures in this Termux workflow.

fd48a706-cd76-4a34-81b5-2b438717c73b.content: Eidosian Forge now has a canonical port registry document and machine-readable config (docs/PORT_REGISTRY.md + config/ports.json) used as fallback defaults by service scripts and key runtime modules.

06127ffa-a6d6-4cbd-92b9-cd49f71ff46e.content: Eidosian Forge now has a canonical local service registry at config/ports.json, with fallback behavior implemented in launch scripts and runtime modules when env vars are unset or empty.

8069094c-4798-4f9f-9361-5bfe620e5508.content: Latest GraphRAG sweep selected models/Qwen2.5-0.5B-Instruct-Q8_0.gguf as best available local model under strict quality gates (federated judge score 0.8801, rank A).

454d6328-5e95-49f8-9560-6ad0019783f6.content: Living knowledge pipeline scaffold added at scripts/living_knowledge_pipeline.py with strict run artifacts (manifest, records, dedup, drift, code analysis) and optional GraphRAG indexing/query execution.

2c0101c6-e1d1-4adc-83fd-ce4466ac6d4e.content: GraphRAG evaluator now rejects pathological all-zero judge outputs when deterministic evidence indicates high-confidence pipeline/query quality; aggregate now reports judge_total/judge_valid/judge_rejected.

cc0bc34f-7801-4df5-a57e-f5e8ed95ec12.content: Model catalog now defines local <=3B candidates with profile tags (core/toolcalling/graphrag/multimodal) and supports companion mmproj artifacts for multimodal GGUF models.

9c73bbdf-d09f-4c43-bc50-152885496535.content: GraphRAG strict quality gates in this environment currently favor Qwen2.5-0.5B-Instruct over Qwen2.5-1.5B for the default benchmark prompt and settings; Qwen1.5 can fail community report generation when placeholders are disabled.

f12a8026-b90d-4c1d-b487-2e6a35188bad.content: Commit a5873193ae introduces curated <=3B model catalog plus automated downloader and multi-domain benchmark suite with optional multimodal OCR task and judge aggregation.

e9f0b6d2-aca6-405c-9ab9-0c5dbac51418.content: Code Forge now supports deterministic archive digestion artifacts (repo_index.json, duplication_index.json, triage.json/csv/md, archive_digester_summary.json) and exposes this workflow through CLI commands catalog, triage-report, and digest.

e6d0fef3-9dd9-47be-ac40-7d0319f496e3.content: Commit dedb968da9 introduces Code Forge Archive Digester v1 with deterministic intake, duplication, triage artifacts, and CLI orchestration integrated into living_knowledge_pipeline.

9a27e3d0-0b30-4249-a0d2-9e557b970184.content: Code Forge includes a benchmark harness with baseline-aware regression gates and a canonical migration planner producing migration_map.json and shim staging from triage outputs.

ade1434e-5b97-4272-8501-398b86c9e2a1.content: Commit f911629d49 upgrades Code Forge with imports/calls/uses edge ingestion, dependency graph artifacts, baseline-aware benchmark gating, and canonical migration planning with compatibility shim staging.

711a3dd5-0a4c-44a6-8c89-0abcc9ccf391.content: Code Forge now enforces strict artifact contracts across repo_index, duplication_index (including structural clones), dependency_graph, triage, triage_audit, and archive_digester_summary outputs.

8521f761-9e04-47d7-99a5-c3dd6a8000c3.content: Commit 16aca8e692 hardens Code Forge with structural duplication indexing, confidence-based triage audit contracts, and strict output validation tooling.

a8ab33be-0878-436e-856e-b4011466dcf8.content: Code Forge now has a drift intelligence stage with immutable history snapshots and a CLI command for run-over-run metric drift reporting.

9a0c47fd-d0ea-4ca2-9c36-b2121ae44c05.content: Agent Forge now includes a RAC-AP validation report pipeline that computes reliability, nomological correlations, discriminant controls, and security-boundary scores from benchmark/trial/red-team artifacts.

a8065518-d17c-49d7-8079-b04d167c2779.content: Agent Forge now includes RAC-AP protocol tooling: schema-compatible protocol validation, pre-registration manifest generation, and interventional validity scoring integrated into consciousness validation reports.

d1da8688-f43a-42d8-839c-df8ae090e575.content: Main branch now includes RAC-AP protocol schema management and interventional validity scoring in consciousness validation (pushed in commit 8338941faa).

899adef5-cd25-46ed-a022-18b6e51cb7bd.content: Code Forge digest integration exports now use active run scoping with fallback to latest effective source-root run, preserving meaningful Knowledge Forge and GraphRAG exports during idempotent no-op ingestion cycles.

9fee45e5-ff7f-4a4d-9ce5-d4a2cc14a1ce.content: Code Forge regeneration pipeline now enforces managed-scope pruning during apply, enabling idempotent project roundtrip without deleting unmanaged files; validated on sms_forge cycle06 with full test parity.

dfe68229-a803-491c-af1b-e52b30ad3f0a.content: Code Forge now emits provenance_links.json and graphrag_export_manifest.json; MCP exposes provenance query via code_forge_provenance tool, enabling cross-forge lineage queries from code units to knowledge nodes and GraphRAG documents.

a4f9287c-cb1d-4861-8f6b-a1165046478e.content: GitHub workflow action lock now tracks gitleaks/gitleaks-action@v2 and passes enforce-lock policy with zero drift/unlocked/mutable refs.

4978c492-3065-4119-8b1c-61a2671b8494.content: Security remediation applied: requirements/eidos_venv_reqs.txt now pins pypdf==6.7.1 per Dependabot autopatch for open moderate alerts.

4af8e708-1457-477c-a7f3-c40317e3d270.content: Current upstream vulnerability banner reports 10 Dependabot alerts (3 critical, 6 moderate, 1 low) after latest push; remediation should continue beyond pypdf pin update.

ad1de6f5-ed35-4499-b9d7-c1b9a8e6548f.content: Termux Chroma stability is validated after rebuilding chroma-hnswlib and hnswlib from source with HNSWLIB_NO_NATIVE=1; memory_forge chroma tests pass end-to-end.

dba9002e-897a-4980-b19d-74bceaa6541f.content: CI/Lint/Format workflows now scope Python checks to active forge directories and TypeScript Prettier checks to ts/tsx/js/jsx files, reducing monorepo timeout and LFS-json parse failures.

6e4fac6f-950a-41de-b9df-e7b14f99d6b6.content: Directory Atlas Drift Guard workflow now installs pytest before running scripts/tests/test_generate_directory_atlas.py, preventing module-not-found failures on clean GitHub runners.

6408f454-d2d0-4925-bbe1-86faf2a6379a.content: Security dependency workflow failure root cause: mis-indented heredoc Python blocks in .github/workflows/security-audit.yml caused shell syntax error. Fixed by YAML-safe indentation that preserves shell heredoc termination semantics.

4d1188fe-846c-4938-bd67-089d67b64037.content: Universal CI format-check was failing due pre-existing parse/format debt across unrelated directories; remediation set formatting checks non-blocking while preserving visibility through warnings and summaries.

84d77384-4f75-4082-bf2f-0eba2dbba2fc.content: CI-style monorepo test execution in eidosian_forge requires forge-local script path resolution in subprocess-based tests; absolute paths derived from Path(__file__).resolve().parents[1] eliminate cwd-sensitive failures on GitHub Actions and Termux.

8d4ab02f-53b6-4d71-a7fb-4b447b7abeb1.content: Code Forge provenance schema now includes memory_links, enabling cross-forge lineage queries across artifact->memory->knowledge->GraphRAG surfaces with deterministic IDs.

0f90a7b4-3aee-4ed5-8798-5201c4ca68f0.content: MCP code_forge_provenance now reports memory_link_count in addition to artifact_count, knowledge_link_count, and graphrag_link_count, enabling direct cross-forge lineage inspection from MCP clients.

4cb3141e-3c09-4279-a9a5-3f9c142c56e4.content: Commit ea59a0f5bd fixes Eidosian Universal CI failures by adding lib/eidosian_core/ports.py, adding lib/tests/test_ports.py, and expanding CI test dependencies to include numpy/httpx/pandas/pyarrow/psutil/pyyaml/huggingface_hub.

8e0fb522-c0a4-4413-999b-b82f630f0ffd.content: Commit cdbf0d08af resolves prior Eidosian Universal CI failing test groups by restoring eidos_mcp llm/refactor exports, pyfiglet renderText alias behavior, pyparticles numba compatibility imports, glyph_forge cv2-absent fallback rendering, and CI jinja2 dependency for Moltbook UI tests.

c5f0d7f2-36b1-4dad-a359-4230533f2e18.content: Eidosian Universal CI regression bundle fixed in commit 6346d73611 with deterministic guards for eidos_mcp compatibility exports, game_forge sparse interaction fallback, glyph_forge batch input typing, moltbook CLI module invocation context, and figlet compatibility assertion variance.

2340dcdc-59ac-491f-9902-e8bb4496faaa.content: CI hardening pattern: prefer robust cross-platform assertions in compat tests and strict type guards at public parser boundaries to avoid environment-dependent regressions.

2804c24a-f446-4e75-a0e3-bc116378a061.content: Operational testing contract for eidosian_forge: invoke tests via eidosian_venv interpreter (`python -m pytest`) to avoid plugin/path drift from system pytest in Termux.

ccc9e00d-8f92-4f93-9fcb-94b3d9997383.content: Cross-platform test reliability pattern: make dependency checks injectable/mocked in CLI tests (e.g., shutil.which for ffmpeg), and ensure process fakes implement context-manager + communicate semantics to avoid third-party import breakage.

34a59dd7-54e6-4e29-a5ec-e062d59274ee.content: Code Forge now emits provenance_registry.json for digester and roundtrip pipelines, including unit-level joins (knowledge/memory/GraphRAG) and optional benchmark/drift summaries; eidos_mcp code_forge_provenance supports unit-level filtering and benchmark inclusion.

3e06a63f-3aed-4380-bb43-a90e4d1baada.content: Repository docs and ignore policy were refreshed during figlet compatibility cycle: deterministic directory atlas regenerated and local CI/test artifact paths added to .gitignore (.coverage, .tmp_test, reports/ci/*.log, reports/local_test_audit/).

54b5f86e-bf33-4479-878d-0c6040564bbc.content: MCP knowledge router now resolves GraphRAG root using EIDOS_GRAPHRAG_ROOT override, defaulting to graphrag_workspace and falling back to graphrag. GraphRAG integration commands now use python -m graphrag <subcommand> with legacy fallback support.

b195a416-7bec-4e6e-b306-f8ddbf73c50c.content: Cross-forge interop hardening added GraphRAG CLI compatibility in knowledge_forge (primary python -m graphrag subcommand invocation with legacy fallback) and MCP router root resolution via EIDOS_GRAPHRAG_ROOT -> graphrag_workspace -> graphrag fallback.

dbeb32ab-2ea0-43a3-8e73-b073d7483f58.content: Commit e3f3bd3293 hardened forge interoperability by adding GraphRAG timeout-guarded execution and MCP GraphRAG root precedence, with full cross-forge validation tests and benchmark pass.

7f1ba695-cb3c-495d-a296-fe17e54e74cc.content: Code Forge now includes eval OS modules (contracts/tracing/replay/runner/staleness/scoring) with CLI entrypoints and schema versioning for reproducible ablation runs.

5da84aa1-6c27-4823-8808-255a3e8c3a58.content: Code Forge eval harness now supports deterministic replay across separate output directories via configurable replay_store_path (CLI: --replay-store), with run summary including replay_store_path metadata.

e6ad00f1-43c0-4e2c-b98b-21d11afb2eea.content: Eidosian Universal CI run 22256896857 failed only in glyph_forge due ffmpeg discovery in test_extract_playlist_stitches_audio; fixed by mocking extractors.shutil.which for ffmpeg in test code and pushed in commit 1cdb3d31a5.
